contextId.occurrenceNote: This means that the fire came from God. Alternate translation: "fire from God" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-possession]])

Here the phrase "of fire" means that these were surround by fire. Alternate translation: "a chariot surrounded by fire pulled by horses surrounded by fire" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-possession]])
contextId.glQuote: a chariot of fire and horses of fire

contextId.occurrenceNote: This pillar was used in the worship of Baal, though it is unknown what the pillar looked like. Alternate translation: "the sacred stone pillar for worshiping Baal" (See: [[rc://en/ta/man/translate/figs-possession]])
contextId.glQuote: the sacred stone pillar of Baal
